USE gold_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateServerlessView_Gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement NVARCHAR(MAX)
    
    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + N' AS
    SELECT * FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://mgrdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @ViewName + ''',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    ) AS result;'

    EXEC sp_executesql @statement
END
GO
